title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 March 2014 - XWiki

10:14 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <tmortagne> vmassol: Hi  
10:16 <tmortagne> looks like there is an issue with org.xwiki.activeinstalls.test.ui.ActiveInstallsTest.verifyPingIsSent  
10:17 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok thanks, I'll check it out  
10:17 <tmortagne> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-activeinstalls-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.activeinstalls.test.ui/ActiveInstallsTest/verifyPingIsSent/  
10:17 <vmassol> ah yes I see  
10:18 <vmassol> caused by my change of yesterday, should have executed the func tests  
10:18 <vmassol> I thought my change didn't change anything but it did  
10:18 <tmortagne> (won't say anything given the number of commits I had to do yesterday to fix integration tests I broke...)  
10:19 <vmassol> :)  
10:39 <unknown\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <woshilapin> has quit  
10:39 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <woshilapin> has quit  
10:40 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:07 <sbaloul> has joined #xwiki  
11:17 <spu7nic> has joined #xwiki  
11:18 <spu7nic> Greetings :)  
11:18 <vmassol> hi  
11:19 <vmassol> tmortagne: build should be fine now, sorry for the problem and thanks for reporting it!  
11:20 <D-Spair> has quit  
11:22 <tmortagne> mflorea: it's possible you last commits on EM broken some integration tests in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/ (at least according to the timing)  
11:23 <mflorea> yes, I'm aware of it  
11:23 <tmortagne> ok  
11:23 <tmortagne> last failing thing and we'll get a clean jenkins ;)  
11:24 <vmassol> we need to evaluate when we can release 5.4.3 and 6.0M1 btw :)  
11:25 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: you forget the date on dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/ReleasePlan542  
11:25 <vmassol> mflorea: I see we have 2 issues open for 5.4.3, any ETA?  
11:25 <tmortagne> forgot  
11:25 <mflorea> vmassol: today  
11:26 <vmassol> great  
11:26 <tmortagne> no blocker stuff remaning on 6.0M1 so I guess we are good to go  
11:28 <tmortagne> vmassol: what is the status of XWIKI-9930 ?  
11:28 <lucaa> has quit  
11:29 <vmassol> tmortagne: I guess I need to look at it again and commit it on master (after 6.0M1 has been released probably)  
11:30 <vmassol> I've just moved it to 6.0M2  
11:31 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: thx, done  
11:34 <gdelhumeau> is there any way to modify macros.vm and to see the results without restarting the wiki?  
11:34 <vmassol> yes  
11:35 <vmassol> by using a different skin  
11:35 <vmassol> there's one velocity engine per skin  
11:35 <tmortagne> yes but a new skin each time you do a modification :)  
11:35 <vmassol> yup  
11:36 <gdelhumeau> anything else?  
11:36 <vmassol> not that I know of  
11:36 <vmassol> since velocity caches velocimacros  
11:36 <vmassol> now maybe there's some internal velocity api that can be called to reload it  
11:36 <vmassol> would need to check velocity source code  
11:37 <gdelhumeau> hmm, it does not when I have moved some macros in menus/macros.vm  
11:37 <vmassol> indeed  
11:37 <tmortagne> you can maybe write some grooby script to remove the current skin from the velocity engines map  
11:37 <vmassol> you need to use a config property if you don't use the default  
11:37 <tmortagne> in DefaultVelocityFactory component  
11:37 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: see DefaultVelocityManaer  
11:37 <vmassol> \*Manager  
11:38 <vmassol>                     }  
11:38 <vmassol> macros.vm is supposed to be in templates/ by default  
11:38 <spu7nic> has quit  
11:39 <vmassol> hmm actually that's for the default, then cache is for each skin  
11:39 <vmassol> let me check the value of cachekey  
11:39 <vmassol> it's macros.vm in the skin directory  
11:39 <vmassol> at the root  
11:39 <gdelhumeau> then it might not be a good idea to put some macros in an other file, only in this skin  
11:40 <vmassol> context.getWiki().getSkinFile("macros.vm", skin, context);  
11:40 <vmassol> this was all designed to have a single macros.vm file

15:01 <tmortagne> we don't even have a release manager AFAIK

15:02 <tmortagne> ok it was probably decided when I was not here  
15:03 <mflorea> I discussed with vmassol
